original_text: Wherefore say unto the children of Israel, I am the Lord, and I will bring you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians, and I will rid you out of their bondage, and I will redeem you with a stretched out arm, and with great judgments:
korean_text: 그러므로 이스라엘 자손에게 말하기를 나는 여호와라 내가 애굽 사람의 무거운 짐 밑에서 너희를 빼내며 그들의 노역에서 너희를 건지며 편 팔과 여러 큰 심판들로써 너희를 속량하여

sentences.original_text: Wherefore say unto the children of Israel
and I will bring you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 이집트의 짐 아래에서 인도해 내겠다

sentences.original_text: and I will rid you out of their bondage
and I will redeem you with a stretched out arm
